column4: Is there a way to access information about a laptop's various video out settings?
I am able to switch my screen over to my TV-out using the built-in buttons, but the second I open an application the colors shift in a freaky way - this does not happen in windows
have you updated your video drivers?
misfit_toy, Well its an ancient card (ati 7500) so yes, but there haven't been many updates :P
I'm really just looking for a video options settings.. Like devices/monitor setup
